name: Pokémon DarkJasper
overview: STORY: Somia is a very beautiful region that people and Pokemon live together. This region has blue beaches and small lovely islands and at the center of Somia, you can see Heavens mountain. But the peaceful life was destroyed because of the hidden secrets from the oracles of Somia. A radical dream researching team – CYPRUS threaten the security of mind and body alike as they search for “dream cores”, the power behind our dreams. Now come back to you, the main character of Pokemon DarkJasper. You are just a young trainer and want to explore new things with your Pokemon. But on your way, you incidentally know some secrets and you realize your role is to save your world. Find out more the game plot by playing Pokemon DarkJaper. FEATURES: • New Game Synopsis • Day and Night Time System • New tiles and sprites • Weather Feature • Black/White Repel System Port • Honey Trees • Interesting Sound • More Pokemon to catch • Daily Events • New HM and TM List
